posts.post_content:
For sale is a very well loved T206 of Walter Johnson pitching variation. Sweet Caporal reverse has tape across it and I don't dare remove it =) I have pic of reverse if you want to see it. Will sell for $70 or am looking to use as partial trade bait for something on my want list below

N172 : Galvin, Nichols, Radbourn, Welch, Mathews
N284 Keefe
'14 or '15 CJ : Alexander, Johnson, Collins

Thanks as always,

Paul
